snippet: Maikel Reyes scored on a header in the 73rd minute to lift Cuba to a 1-0 win over Guatemala in the Concacaf Gold Cup.
abstract: Cuba defeats Guatemala, 1-0, to advance to quarterfinals of Concacaf Gold Cup soccer tournament; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Maikel Reyes scored on a header in the 73rd minute to lift Cuba to a 1-0 win over Guatemala in the Concacaf Gold Cup.

headline.main: Cuba Beats Guatemala in Gold Cup
